If input fields has required attribute and is hidden with display: none, validation message appears at the bottom left corner of the screen.

Reproducible: Always



Expected Results:  
I do not know, what the proper behavior should be. Google Chrome raises exception in this case.

Ubuntu 11.04, 4.0.1+build1+nobinonly-0ubuntu0.11.04.3

Also, bug was reproduced in the official build of Firefox 4.0.1 for windows.
In Ubuntu if window is maximized the bubble is stretched at the top of the window.
